trans-unit.source: Information about automobiles by make and model, including the price, features such as the number of cylinders and MPG, as well as an insurance risk score.<html></html> <html></html>The risk score is initially associated with auto price and then adjusted for actual risk in a process known to actuaries as symboling.
trans-unit.target: Information about automobiles by make and model, including the price, features such as the number of cylinders and MPG, as well as an insurance risk score.<html></html> <html></html>The risk score is initially associated with auto price and then adjusted for actual risk in a process known to actuaries as symboling.

trans-unit.source: A value of +3 indicates that the auto is risky, and a value of -3 that it is probably pretty safe.<html></html> <html></html><html></html>Usage:<html></html> Predict the risk score by features, using regression or multivariate classification.
trans-unit.target: A value of +3 indicates that the auto is risky, and a value of -3 that it is probably pretty safe.<html></html> <html></html><html></html>Usage:<html></html> Predict the risk score by features, using regression or multivariate classification.

trans-unit.source: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
